articles.description: Pujara went into lunch on 92 and hardly wasted any time to reach the landmark upon his return. Pujara hammered Saurabh for a couple of fours, one through the cover and one behind the point fielder, to complete his hundred.
articles.content:
IMAGE: Cheteshwar Pujara scored a 100 in the West Zone semi-final against Central Zone in Alur on Friday. Photograph: Stu Forster/Getty Images

articles.title: Asian Games: What 'flicked the switch' for swim sensation Nehra - Rediff.com
articles.description: Aryan Nehra, 19, went on a record-breaking spree at the senior swimming Nationals where he smashed as many as four records in a stupendous campaign.
articles.content:
'I worked a bit harder over the last year than I did in the past.'
